menu.title: 'Fitness' menu
menu.descr: The 'Fitness' menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. For people who are interested in sports. It's an entirely new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: 'Vegetarian' menu
menu.descr: Our special 'Vegetarian' menu - it's a careful set of ingredients: absolutely no animal ingredients. A complete harmony with oneself and nature in every element!

menu.title: 'Premium' menu
menu.descr: The 'Premium' menu - we use not only a pretty packaging design, but also quality cooking. Salmon meat, seafood, fruits - restaurant quality meal without going anywhere!
